text: Yevgeny Viktorovich Bushmin (, 4 October 1958 â€“ 6 October 2019) was a Russian politician. He was a Deputy of the 1st State Duma and Deputy Finance Minister. He was the member of the Federation Council of the Federal Assembly as the representative of Nizhny Novgorod Oblast. Bushmin died on 6 October 2019, two days after his 61st birthday, after a long-illness. ==References== Category:1958 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Members of the State Duma Category:Politicians from Nizhny Novgorod Category:Members of the Federation Council (Russia)
title: Yevgeny Bushmin
